title: Stuck on Authetification a

replies.body: We did have a few issues earlier today, but those EU authentication issues should now all be cleared up, so give it go now if you haven't yet.

Hi there Broporo, i am stuck on authentification and have tried everything from a fix tool to restarting the client and even as far as to just smply redownload client but still no luck, please help, i am at this point freaking out!

Getting stuck at authentication means there's some kind of block between your network and our login servers. One of the best first steps is to update your port forward and DNS settings following those steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).
